Title: An Act Establishing an Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Isabela, Province of Basilan, to be Known as Isabela Emergency Hospital, and Authorizing the Appropriation of Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 112
An Act Establishing an Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Isabela, Province of Basilan, to be Known as Isabela Emergency Hospital, and Authorizing the Appropriation of Funds Therefor
Section 1. There shall be established under the supervision of the Director of Medical Services, Ministry of Health, a twenty-five-bed capacity emergency hospital in the Municipality of Isabela, Province of Basilan, to be known as Isabela Emergency Hospital.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. The amount needed for the operation of the hospital shall be determined in accordance with Section 40 of Presidential Decree No. 1177 and charged to the appropriations authorized by Batasang Pambansa Blg. 40 and 80 for the Ministry of Health intended for new hospitals. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act. The Minister of Health shall determine the manner by which said hospital shall be operationalized.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: January 21, 1981
